Rulings.Base:
1. This card does not target.
2. This effect only applies to Defense Position monsters that were present when this card resolved.
3. You can activate this card even when your opponent controls only Defense Position Normal Monsters.
4. The effects of the monsters changed to Attack Position remain negated for as long as those monsters remain face-up. Any of their effects that activate or apply on the field are negated.
5. If a face-down "Elemental HERO Wildheart" is changed to face-up Attack Position by this card, the effect of "Elemental HERO Wildheart" WILL be negated.
